TITLE Roasted Shrimp with Rosemary & Thyme

# Preheat oven to 425F.
# To a 9x13 inch glass baking dish, add: [6 tbl olive oil], [6 item sprigs fresh thyme] and [3 item sprigs fresh rosemary]. 
and some [black pepper].
# Bake until the herbs become fragrant, about 10 minutes.
# Add [1.5 lbs shrimp to the dish]. Toss shrimp to coat in the herb oil. 
# Bake shrimp until pink and firm.
# Removed from oven and add [2 tbl white wine vinegar]. Stir to combine.
